column3:
One morning, Justin woke up very excited. He was excited because it was his birthday. He went downstairs to eat breakfast. 
ewline
ewlineWhen he got downstairs his mom said, "Happy Birthday."
ewline
ewline"Thank you!" Justin said. "Am I going to have lots of presents?" he asked his mom. 
ewline
ewline"Yes, Justin. When your friends come over for your birthday party you'll get lots!"
ewline
ewline"Hooray!" Justin said, eating his breakfast. 
ewline
ewlineLater that day, Justin's friends came over for his birthday party, and they brought over lots of presents. 
ewline
ewlineThey ate cake and ice cream. They played games like tag and played with a football. 
ewline
ewlineAfter they were done playing Justin got to open his presents. He saw lots of presents. Red ones, blue ones, tall ones, round ones. 
ewline
ewline"Thank you!" Justin said, as he started to open his presents. He got a basketball, a robot toy, a new bike and some super hero toys!
ewline
ewlineAfter all of Justin's friends left, Justin fell asleep very fast because of the exciting day he had and he was happy he got all of those nice things.
column4: multiple: Who did Justin talk to when he went downstairs?
column9: one: Why was Justin excited to wake up?
column14: multiple: What was one of the games Justin played with his Friends?
column19: one: What was one of the presents Justin got?
